Text: Much, Much better than the top torrent. THanks so much man. Not everyone wants a cheap thrill on an ipod screen, some of us download these seasons to enjoy for hours on real setups. thanks a lot mate, you are the Vic Mackey of Pirate Bay
Why is every other season than season 1 not properly widescreen?
Because that's how the dvds were produced.

riplikethat:
Also, not all widescreen is shot at 16:9.  The term widescreen is usually used for anything wider than 4:3.  Just because it's not 16:9, doesn't mean it's "improper", it's just how it was shot/dvds were produced.  I have to admit, some of the shield dvds had weird ratios (wider than 4:3, yet skinnier than 16:9), but like's been said, them's were the dvds.
Great job meech. I can enjoy of this series thanks to you!!
